title: Bonus RP
body: Will there be any promotions in the near future either Halloween or Christmas that will give bonus rp when you buy rp from the store?

replies.body:
Not sure! We'll be keeping our eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for an announcement just as you are. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
